imagingbook-calibrate 1.6-SNAPSHOT API

This Java library implements Zhang's camera calibration algorithm.

See: Description

Packages 
Package Description
calibration_demos  
calibration_demos_more  
imagingbook.calibration.zhang
Core classes of the camera calibration library.
imagingbook.calibration.zhang.testdata
Published test data for Zhang's camera calibration method, provided as Java resources.
imagingbook.calibration.zhang.util
Various utility classes used by the calibration library.

This Java library implements Zhang's camera calibration algorithm.

Reference: Z. Zhang, "A flexible new technique for camera calibration", IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence, 22(11), pp. 1330-1334 (2000).

Note that this implementation performs the geometric part of camera calculation but does not provide interest point detection and point correspondence calculations. See this extensive report for details.

Author: Wilhelm Burger

Dependencies: Requires ImageJ, the ImagingBook Common library and Apache Commons Math.

Installation:

  1. Place imagingbook-common.jar and imagingbook-calibrate.jar in ImageJ/jars/.
  2. Place the sample plugins in ImageJ/plugins/.
  3. Restart ImageJ.
